expo.name: MyTrainPro
expo.description: AI-powered fitness coaching with evidence-based periodization, nutrition tracking, and personalized workout plans for serious fitness enthusiasts.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MyTrainPro uses the camera to capture food images for AI-powered nutrition analysis and tracking.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MyTrainPro accesses your photo library to let you upload food images for nutrition analysis and set profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: MyTrainPro integrates with Apple Health to sync your fitness and nutrition data for comprehensive health tracking.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: MyTrainPro can write workout and nutrition data to Apple Health to keep all your health information synchronized.
